活発発地: (かっぱつぱっち) - (yoji) being full of vitality (energy); vigorous and in high spirits
活眼: (かつがん) - keen or piercing eye
活線: (かっせん) - live wire; hot line (as in electrical hot-line working)
活締: (いけしめ) - (いけじめ only) draining blood from a live fish (from above the gills and at the base of the tail) to keep it fresh; (esp. いけしめ) fasting fish for several days to preserve flavour and quality (and reduce mortality during transport); (esp. いけしめ) killing fish in a fishtank (immediately before cooking)/fish killed in a fishtank
活締め: (いけしめ) - (いけじめ only) draining blood from a live fish (from above the gills and at the base of the tail) to keep it fresh; (esp. いけしめ) fasting fish for several days to preserve flavour and quality (and reduce mortality during transport); (esp. いけしめ) killing fish in a fishtank (immediately before cooking)/fish killed in a fishtank
活花: (いけばな) - flower arrangement; (せいか only) fresh flowers
活荷重: (かつかじゅう) - live load (e.g. on bridge); liveload
活褶曲: (かつしゅうきょく) - {geol} active fold
活路: (かつろ) - means of survival; means of escape
活路開拓: (かつろかいたく) - developing a way or means
活躍: (katsuyaku) - activity (especialmente energético), great efforts, conspicuous service; to flourish, to participate actively, to play an active role
活魚: (いけうお) - live fish and shellfish (kept in a tank in a restaurant)
派: (ha) - seita, clique, grupo, círculo; (político) facção, ala, partido; escola; seita, denominação
派兵: (はへい) - dispatch of troops; despatch of troops
派出: (はしゅつ) - sending out; dispatching; despatching
派出婦: (はしゅつふ) - maid or housekeeper (in a visiting arrangement)
派出所: (はしゅつしょ) - local police station
派手好き: (はでずき) - flamboyant; extravagant; showy; attention-seeking
派手好み: (はでごのみ) - flamboyant; extravagant; showy; attention-seeking
派米: (はべい) - dispatching to the US; despatching to the US
派遣会社: (はけんがいしゃ) - temporary staff recruitment agency; employment agency
派遣切り: (はけんきり) - downsizing by laying off part-time and temp. workers
派遣労働者: (はけんろうどうしゃ) - dispatched worker
派遣従業員: (はけんじゅうぎょういん) - temporary worker
派遣社員: (はけんしゃいん) - temporary employee (esp. from an agency); temporary worker; agency temp
派遣職員: (はけんしょくいん) - temporary staff; loaned staff (e.g. from a parent or related organization)
派遣記者: (はけんきしゃ) - reporter posted to another location (city, country, etc.); reporter on assignment
派閥争い: (はばつあらそい) - factional dispute; factional strife; rivalry between factions
派閥人事: (はばつじんじ) - (yoji) faction-based personnel appointment
派閥力学: (はばつりきがく) - (yoji) factional dynamics; power relationships among factions; factional power politics
派閥均衡: (はばつきんこう) - (yoji) balance of power among factions (within a political party); factional balance
派閥抗争: (はばつこうそう) - (yoji) factional infighting (conflict); antagonism between factions
流: (ryu/naga) - stream , fashion, way, style, manner; school (of thought); class, rank, rate; current (electrical, water, etc.), flow, stream
流し: (nagashi) - sink (ex. cozinha); cruising (e.g. taxi), strolling (entertainer, musician, etc.) , sink (e.g. kitchen); cruising (e.g. taxi), strolling (entertainer, musician, etc.); washing area in a Japanese-style bath; back-washing service (in a public bath)
流しそうめん: (ながしそうめん) - fine white noodles served flowing in a small flume
流し出す: (ながしだす) - to draw off; to run out; to flush out
流し場: (ながしば) - place for showering next to a tub
流し打ち: (ながしうち) - {baseb} hitting to the opposite field
流し目: (ながしめ) - sidelong glance; flirtatious glance
流し素麺: (ながしそうめん) - fine white noodles served flowing in a small flume
流し索麺: (ながしそうめん) - fine white noodles served flowing in a small flume
流し込む: (ながしこむ) - to pour into/to wash down; to insert (e.g. into a data stream)
流し雛: (ながしびな) - paper dolls floated downriver on March 3rd
流す: (ながす) - to drain/to pour/to spill/to shed (blood, tears); to wash away; to distribute (e.g. electricity over wires, music over a PA system, etc.)/to circulate/to broadcast/to beam; to cruise (e.g. taxi); to float/to set adrift; to call off (a meeting, etc.)
流ちょう: (りゅうちょう) - fluent (language skill); flowing
流れ: (nagare) - flow (of a fluid or gas), stream, current; flow (de pessoas, coisas), passage (of time), tide, passing, (changing) trends, tendency , flow (of a fluid or gas), stream, current; flow (of people, things), passage (of time), tide, passing, (changing) trends, tendency; course (of events), (step-by-step) procedure, process; group of people who remain together after the end of an event
流れる: (ながれる) - to stream/to flow (liquid, time, etc.)/to run (ink); to be washed away/to be carried; to drift/to float (e.g. clouds)/to wander/to stray; to sweep (e.g. rumour, fire)/to spread/to circulate; to be heard (e.g. music)/to be played; to lapse (e.g. into indolence, despair); to pass/to elapse/to be transmitted; to be called off/to be forfeited; to disappear/to be removed
流れを汲む: (ながれをくむ) - to be descended from; to be drawn from (the tradition of); to be derived from; to follow the school (tradition) of
流れ下る: (ながれくだる) - to flow down; to run down
流れ出す: (ながれだす) - to flow out; to stream out; to pour out; to gush forth; to leak; to ooze out; to drift away
流れ出る: (ながれでる) - to flow out; to stream out; to pour out; to gush forth; to leak; to ooze out; to drift away
流れ星: (ながれぼし) - {astron}  shooting star/falling star/meteor; star (white patch on the forehead of a horse)
流れ歩く: (ながれあるく) - to wander about
流れ着く: (ながれつく) - to drift to; to be washed ashore
流れ落ちる: (ながれおちる) - to run off (fluid); to run down; to flow down
流れ込む: (ながれこむ) - to flow into; to pour into; to stream into
流下: (りゅうか) - flowing down (e.g. water in a river); downward flow
流人: (りゅうじん) - (an) exile; (りゅうじん only)  vagrant/wanderer/nomad
流会: (りゅうかい) - cancelling a meeting; adjournment of a meeting (due to lack of attendance)
流体力学: (りゅうたいりきがく) - fluid mechanics
流儀: (りゅうぎ) - style/fashion; school (e.g. of poetry)
